text: The 1922 Tempe Normal Owls football team was an American football team that represented Tempe Normal School (later renamed Arizona State University) as an independent during the 1922 college football season. In their first and only season under head coach Ernest C. Wills, the Owls compiled a 0–3–1 record and were outscored by their opponents by a combined total of 74 to 31. Pete Brown was the team captain. ==References== Tempe Normal Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Category:1922 in Arizona
title: 1922 Tempe Normal Owls football team
